def test_create_order_and_pay(client): user_id = _create_user(client) payload = { "user_id": user_id, "discount_code": "OFF10", "items": [ {"sku": "SKU1", "qty": 2, "unit_price": 50000}, {"sku": "SKU2", "qty": 1, "unit_price": 80000}, ] } r = client.post("/orders", json=payload) assert r.status_code == 201, r.text order = r.json() assert order["status"] == "CREATED" assert order["subtotal"] == 180000 > assert order["discount"] == 18000 E assert 36000 == 18000
